name: Flying Brick: Cloning Flappy Bird for Fun and Profit!
name_original: Flying Brick: Cloning Flappy Bird for Fun and Profit!
description:
It's flappy. It flies! But it's a brick so it doesn't fly that well.

Dead simple controls & gameplay: Tap to fly and don't run into anything. But it's a brick, so you gotta tap a *lot* to keep him flying!

Can't beat your friend's score? Cheat! Simply upgrade to get more points!


Created for FlappyJam, in honor of the late, great, Flappy Bird.
